# lyra-tool-discovery

> AI powered automation toolkit which acts as an agent that discovers MCP servers for you. Point it at GitHub/npm/configure your own discovery, let GPT or Claude analyze the API or MCP or any tool, get ready-to-ship plugin configs. Zero manual work.

## Overview

lyra-tool-discovery is an open-source project by nirholas. AI powered automation toolkit which acts as an agent that discovers MCP servers for you. Point it at GitHub/npm/configure your own discovery, let GPT or Claude analyze the API or MCP or any tool, get ready-to-ship plugin configs. Zero manual work.

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/lyra-tool-discovery
- Language: TypeScript
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas

Contributions are welcome. See CONTRIBUTING.md for guidelines.
